page.title: 11PUBS
page.content: There are many pubs in our patch. These are just some of them:One at Chadwell which used to be called{The {Robinson Crusoe}has recently been renamed Daniels,and it now has a cocktail bar and a beer house. At West Tilbury the pub is called the Kings{Head}which is a very old pub.This is on the {Village Green }and in the summer adults can drink outside and children can play there.{ { }At Linford there is{The George and {Dragon}which is on the main road away from the houses but still seems very popular. Also at Chadwell is {The Crosskeys.} It is about a mile away from{Daniels } so it doesn't matter about trade.Just up the road from{The Crosskeys}is the Chadwell Working- Mens Club.So you can see that there are quite a few pubs in our area.
